Acid Absorption.name: Acid Absorption
Acid Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within acidic environments. Its Acid resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Acid Spit.name: Acid Spit
Acid Spit.description: The creature has salivary glands which produce a caustic acid.

acidSpit.name: Acid Spit
acidSpit.description:
The @ref[actor.name]{creature} spits a glob of acidic bile at a target within 20 feet.

On a Critical Hit, this attack causes the @Condition[corroding] condition for 3 Turns.

Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray
Acid Spray.description: The creature has salivary glands which produce a caustic acidic spray.

acidSpray.name: Acid Spray
acidSpray.description:
The creature expels a spray of acidic bile in a 10 foot fan.

On a Critical Hit, this attack causes the @Condition[corroding] condition for 3 Turns.

Amorphous.name: Amorphous
Amorphous.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} may move through a space as narrow as 1 inch in diameter without any penalty to its Stride. It gains a bonus to Dodge equal to its Toughness score and is immune to the @Condition[restrained] condition.

Aqueous Transmission.name: Aqueous Transmission
Aqueous Transmission.description: The @ref[name] is able to move instantaneously through water.

aqueousTransmission.name: Aqueous Transmission
aqueousTransmission.description: When the @ref[name] is within water, it can instantaneously transport itself to any unoccupied space within the same body of water up to 120 feet away. It does not need to be able to see the destination to make this Move.

Bestial Senses.name: Bestial Senses
Bestial Senses.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has finely honed senses and is particularly perceptive of their environment, all Awareness checks gain +2 Boons.

Blood Sense.name: Blood Sense
Blood Sense.description:
The @ref[actor.name] is permanently Blinded, but can precisely sense any blooded creature within 20 feet which does not have all its hit points.

Any weapon or skill attack against a wounded creature does not suffer Banes that would normally apply when Blinded.

Cold Absorption.name: Cold Absorption
Cold Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within frigid environments. Its Cold resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Corruption Absorption.name: Corruption Absorption
Corruption Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to shrug off the effects of Death magic. Its Corruption resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Electricity Absorption.name: Electricity Absorption
Electricity Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to take lightning blasts in stride. Its Electricity resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Elusive Flight.name: Elusive Flight
Elusive Flight.description: This @ref[actor.name]{creature} is especially elusive while in flight, able to swoop in and out of combat without provoking any Disengagement. It can be engaged if it lands upon the ground and Disengagement may apply if it attempts to return to flight.

False Appearance.name: False Appearance
False Appearance.description: While it remains motionless, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} is indistinguishable from some other object or material.

Fire Absorption.name: Fire Absorption
Fire Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an exceptional ability to thrive within scorching environments. Its Fire resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Immutable Form.name: Immutable Form
Immutable Form.description: The @ref[actor.name] is immune to any spell or effect which alters its physical form.

Corrode Weapon.name: Corrode Weapon
Corrode Weapon.description: The internal corrosive metabolism of the @ref[actor.name]{ooze} threatens to dissolve metal weapons that strike it.

oozeCorrodeWeapon.name: Corrode Weapon
oozeCorrodeWeapon.description:
When struck by a melee weapon made of metal, the ooze attempts to consume the weapon itself, potentially breaking it.

This attack is Harmless, but if successful the Quality of the weapon used in the attack is downgraded by one tier. On a Critical Success or if the weapon is already Shoddy, the weapon becomes entirely Broken. Enchanted weapons are protected against this effect.
oozeCorrodeWeapon.condition: Struck in melee by a weapon made of metal.

Multiply.name: Multiply
Multiply.description: The @ref[actor.name]{ooze} grows rapidly, increasing in health and size.

oozeMultiply.name: Multiply
oozeMultiply.description: The ooze's cells rapidly multiply as the creature grows. Its Size increases by 1 and its Health increases by its Toughness value.

Subdivide.name: Subdivide
Subdivide.description: The @ref[actor.name]{ooze} can divide itself into multiple parts, each an independent copy of the original.

oozeSubdivide.name: Subdivide
oozeSubdivide.description:
The ooze's cells rapidly divide and the creature splits in two! The original creature and its clone equally divide its remaining Health. The Size of each resulting creature is decreased by 1.

If in combat, the new creature acts as a Summon and joins at Initiative 1. This Action may only be used if the creature has Size larger than 2. The created ooze never has rank superior to Normal.

Pack Hunter.name: Pack Hunter
Pack Hunter.description:
This creature is a pack hunter, relying on its allies to flank and harrass a target to render it exposed to further harm.

This creature doubles number of Boons awarded from attacking a Flanked enemy.

Pouncing Strike.name: Pouncing Strike
Pouncing Strike.description: This creature lunges forward, putting its whole weight behind a leaping strike.

pouncingStrike.name: Pouncing Strike
pouncingStrike.description:
This attack may be used after a Move that brings the @ref[actor.name]{creature} at least 10 feet closer to its target. If the creature was above the target, this attack gains +1 Boon per 10 feet of elevation decrease in that movement.

If this attack is a Critical Hit, the target of the attack is immediately knocked @Condition[prone].

Psychic Absorption.name: Psychic Absorption
Psychic Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} is exceptionally unyielding to attacks on its mind. Its Psychic resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Radiant Absorption.name: Radiant Absorption
Radiant Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} is no stranger to the chaotic force of light. Its Radiant resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Raking Talons.name: Raking Talons
Raking Talons.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} attacks rapidly with its talons, dealing multiple raking blows against a single target.

rakingTalons.name: Raking Talons
rakingTalons.description:
The @ref[actor.name]{creature} attacks swiftly with both talons.

If at least one attack results in a Critical Success, it inflicts the @Condition[bleeding] condition for 2 Rounds.

Repugnant Pustules.name: Repugnant Pustules
Repugnant Pustules.description: A malodorous cloud hangs about this creature like a pall, the rank noxious scent that can only come from active decay. Striking this creature is likely to release repugnant and corrupting essence.

repugnantPustules.name: Repugnant Pustules
repugnantPustules.description:
When the @ref[actor.name]{creature} is hit by a Strike, it may partially burst to release a spray of sickening fluid that deals Corruption damage. This action scales with Toughness and targets the Reflex defense of any creature within 3 feet.

On a Critical Success, the affected target becomes temporarily @Condition[diseased] for 3 Rounds.

Restless Dead.name: Restless Dead
Restless Dead.description:
The @ref[actor.name]{creature}'s life is sustained by necromantic magic or otherworldly forces. When it would be considered @Condition[dead] it is instead @Condition[incapacitated].

After the conclusion of combat, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} may begin to perform the Recover action, regaining consciousness after the recovery is complete. Recovery in this fashion may be prevented in one of the following ways:

  • The creature was incapacitated by a type of damage for which it is Vulnerable.

  • The magical forces which caused it to rise as undead are disrupted, countered, or otherwise dispelled.

  • The creature's body is destroyed to a degree that it can no longer maintain its physical form.

Restraining Chomp.name: Restraining Chomp
Restraining Chomp.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} uses its powerful jaws to bite and hold a target with a powerful chomp.

restrainingChomp.name: Restraining Chomp
restrainingChomp.description: The creature chomps down upon its target. If the attack is successful and the target is equal or lesser in Size, the target is also Restrained until this creature chooses to release it or the restraint is otherwise broken. Only one target may be restrained by this action at a given time.

Self-Repair.name: Self-Repair
Self-Repair.description: The @ref[actor.name]{construct} activates internal repairing mechanisms to mitigate damage it has taken.

selfRepair.name: Self-Repair
selfRepair.description: The construct recovers its Toughness value in Health and immediately ends a single status condition of its choice that is currently affecting it.

Slippery Form.name: Slippery Form
Slippery Form.description: This creature is permanently slippery, giving it the ability to elude capture by physical restraints.

slipperyEscape.name: Slippery Escape
slipperyEscape.description: The creature uses it slippery form to escape restraints, immediately ending the Restrained condition.

Swooping Strike.name: Swooping Strike
Swooping Strike.description: This creature swoops from high above into a diving attack.

swoopingStrike.name: Swooping Strike
swoopingStrike.description:
This attack may be used after a Move which descended at least 10 feet towards the target. The attack gains +1 Boon per 10 feet of elevation decrease in that movement.

If this attack is a Critical Hit, the target of the attack is immediately knocked @Condition[prone].

Thrash.name: Thrash
Thrash.description: Once the @ref[actor.name]{creature} has an enemy restrained, it will thrash violently dealing terrible blows to the grasped victim.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The creature deals Deadly damage to a target that it currently has Restrained.
thrash.condition: The target is Restrained by this creature.

Tusk Charge.name: Tusk Charge
Tusk Charge.description: The Boar lowers its head and charges with frantic speed, it's tusks protruding from beneath a drooling gullet.

tuskCharge.name: Tusk Charge
tuskCharge.description: Charge in a direct line up to your Stride and make a Strike against the first creature you encounter. If successful, the target is knocked Prone.

Magical Sight.name: Magical Sight
Magical Sight.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} has otherworldly sight that makes it especially aware of dangers or opportunities. It gains +2 Boons to any Awareness check and can see @Condition[invisible] creatures.

venomousBite.name: Venomous Bite
venomousBite.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} attacks, injects toxin which, if successful, inflicts the @Condition[poisoned] condition for 6 Turns.

Void Absorption.name: Void Absorption
Void Absorption.description: The @ref[actor.name]{creature} is no stranger to the orderly force of darkness. Its Void resistance is doubled and if that resistance would reduce an amount of damage below zero, the negative amount is received as Healing instead.

Web Spinner.name: Web Spinner
Web Spinner.description:
The @ref[actor.name]{creature} can create powerfully adhesive webbing. It ignores any movement restrictions or restraints otherwise caused by webbing.

While in contact with a web, the @ref[actor.name]{creature} knows the precise location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

webSpinner.name: Web Spinner
webSpinner.description: The creature can spend 10 minutes to spin a new new section of webbing that covers a 5-foot area.
